name: PinotPairs
0:
”Alexa Open Pinot Pairs”
”What's the pairing for a fish taco?”
”Pair Chicken Caesar salad”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pinot pairs
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tell Alexa to "Open Pinot Pairs" and have Pinot give you the perfect wine pairing for your meal! Pinot knows several thousand wine pairings and wants to help you perfectly pair your food! Just tell Pinot a food and he will respond with the perfect wine! 

Pinot Pairs uses machine learning to find the perfect wine pairing for whatever you are eating, whether it’s fish tacos, steak or even ice cream!

--- Example Commands ---

"Alexa, open Pinot Pairs"
"Pair Chicken Caeser Salad"
"Pair pizza"
"Pair Belgian Waffles"
"What's the wine pairing for a steak?"
"Stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
